<a id="ImageFramesFormatLoader"></a>

# ImageFramesFormatLoader

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [ImageFramesFormatLoaderExtension](ImageFramesFormatLoaderExtension.md)

Base class to add support for specific image sequence formats.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The engine supports multiple image sequence formats out of the box, but you can choose to implement support for additional image sequence formats by extending [ImageFramesFormatLoaderExtension](ImageFramesFormatLoaderExtension.md).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>
